tool_description: A version of our Full-Text RSS API, but running on US and Canada servers. https://market.mashape.com/fivefilters/full-text-rss
title: Full-Text RSS US

api_list.name: Convert feed
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com/makefulltextfeed.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extract article
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com/extract.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com/extract.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "full-text-rss-us-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
